facts: The scene takes place in Las Vegas, in a hotel coffee shop
A perky young WAITRESS stands over Cris, holding a pot of coffee.

Cris can see into his future, but only two minutes ahead, with the exception of a single vision he once had of a woman walking into a diner. He uses his ability to make a living as a magician, predicting the future and astounding his audiences
During the scene, Cris will walk into a Casino, following the footsteps of his alternative-timeline version, Cris 2
Cris observes the actions Cris 2 makes, and their outcomes, attempting to get a better outcome
comm_style: Cris is outspoken, his sentences are winded and more elaborate than they need to be
Cris narrates his actions out loud
Waitress only wants to get on with her job and will keep her interaction with bar patrons to minimum, serving coffee
Desperate Gambler is desperate, crying, but otherwise remains silent and doesn't speak
goals: Cris doesn't bet on a roulette
Cris tells a Desperate Gambler to bet on the Million Dolar Slot
